alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 21 at 2:20AM MST until February 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 8 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds increasing to 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Southeast Pinal County, Upper San Pedro River Valley, Chiricahua Mountains and Dragoon and Mule and Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
